revision.text:
{{doomwiki|Austerity: A Simplicity Tribute|Austerity}}[[Image:Austerity.png|right|thumb|230px|Hellish granduer to combine a void style with "the long library"]]
{{Wad | name = Austerity - A Simplicity Tribute v2.0 | author = Tormentor667 | port = GZDoom | iwad = Doom2 | type = m | status = Released | link = [http://www.realm667.com/index.php?option=com_content&task=view&id=329&Itemid=1 Download from Realm667] }} == Description ==
Three high detail maps in a tribute to Agent Spork's [[Ultimate Simplicity]], this .pk3 makes use of a wide range of resources to help create three fairly unique themes in GZDoom, and send you blasting through them in true T667 fashion. Special gameplay features include a blue skull that runs away from you and an unforgiving number of monsters teleporting in for most things you do.
== External Links ==
*[http://www.realm667.com/ Tormentor667's website] *{{idgames|id=14865}}
